bioAsHtml: I'm developer in MyScript Webservices Team where we create tools for helping people to integrate Myscript handwriting recognition through the cloud. I'm a kind of "full stack" developer. I'm a Polymer early adopter and the father of MyScript Web Components.

acceptedTalks.title: Bringing handwriting recognition to your webapp with a Polymer component

bio:
I'm developer in MyScript Webservices Team where we create tools for helping people to integrate Myscript handwriting recognition through the cloud. I'm a kind of "full stack" developer.
I'm a Polymer early adopter and the father of MyScript Web Components.
